name: polaroid1
description: It looks like a picture of this house, from the street. There's a tree you recognize from the front yard, but it's a lot smaller in this picture.

verbInteractions.Use: You're not sure how you would use it...
verbInteractions.Flip: There's a number 9 written on the back.
verbInteractions.Examine: It looks like a picture of this house, from the street. There's a tree you recognize from the front yard, but it's a lot smaller in this picture.
verbInteractions.Take: You'll hold onto the Polaroid for now.
verbInteractions.Shake: It's already developed. You don't need to shake it more.
